title: A composite building shall mean a building comprising both rehab and free-sale components and part thereof along with built up amenity, if proposed, in the same building
clause_text: A composite building shall mean a building comprising both rehab and free-sale components and part thereof along with built up amenity, if proposed, in the same building.
